databaseUrl.label: PostgreSQL URL
databaseUrl.help: PostgreSQL connection string (or use ${DATABASE_URL}). Must point to the same database as persist-user-identity.

databaseUrl.description: PostgreSQL connection string. Falls back to DATABASE_URL env var.

requireVerified.description: When true, memory scoping is gated behind verified identity. Unverified users see a gate message instead of scope.

gateMessage.description: Custom message shown to unverified users when requireVerified is true.
